General.Name: East Money Information Co Ltd
General.Description: East Money Information Co.,Ltd. provides Internet-based financial information, data, and other services in China. It operates in securities, financial e-commerce service, financial data service businesses. The company was formerly known as Shanghai Dong Cai Information Technology Company Limited and changed its name to East Money Information Co.,Ltd. in January 2008. East Money Information Co.,Ltd. was founded in 2005 and is based in Shanghai, China.

3.Name: Jianhai  Huang
3.Title: Deputy GM, CFO, Board Sec. & Non-Independent Director
